      • validatedPut

        public boolean validatedPut(Object key,
                            OIdentifiable value,
                            OIndexEngine.Validator<Object,OIdentifiable> validator)
        Description copied from interface: OIndexEngine
        Puts the given value under the given key into this index engine. Validates the operation using the provided validator.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put the value under.
        value - the value to put.
        validator - the operation validator.
        Returns:
        true if the validator allowed the put, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        OIndexEngine.Validator.validate(Object, Object, Object)
